entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
